user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
last_action: click on the "Chrome" browser app icon located at the lower right part of the screen.
reflect_result: By clicking on the "Chrome" browser app icon, the browser has opened on your phone, which is necessary for navigating to websites like Amazon. This action helps move closer to the user request because now you can visit Amazon and proceed to check out the shopping cart. However, further steps are required to find the "MacBook Air" on Amazon and add it to the cart. So, while this action has made progress, it is not yet complete.
